title: Outbound visitor growth in Africa 2018 to 2022
summary: Overall Year-over-year visitor growth has increased over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2020 and 2021.
Maximum Year-over-year visitor growth, about 4.9 was reported at Year 2021
Minimum Year-over-year visitor growth about 3.3 was reached at Year 2020
min_summary: In general Year-over-year visitor growth has stayed the same over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
